name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Bizarro
name_original: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Bizarro
description:
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Bizarro is an arcade game developed by Feral Interactive and Traveller's Tales. It was originally released in 2015. Warner Bros. Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Bizarro on PC and PlayStation 3.
